thread.title: Podcast\Video-Internship NY-Spring 2016 - Sports Media

title: Podcast\Video-Internship NY-Spring 2016 - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: The intern would help conceive and research topics for the podcast and video interviews; edit and produce; and help package the shows for online and social media distribution.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
